term.title: photon number

item.text: Total number of photons calculated as Np = np.NA with Np the amount of photons in einsteins and NA the Avogadro constant.

notes.item: Mathematical definition: Np = Q/hν for monochromatic radiation of frequency ν, with Q the radiant energy.

sources.item: PAC, 2007, 79, 293. 'Glossary of terms used in photochemistry, 3rd edition (IUPAC Recommendations 2006)' on page 396 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac200779030293)
